personalInfo.name: Sabina Sultana
personalInfo.title: SQA Engineer
personalInfo.summary: As a dedicated and detail-oriented professional, I seek to leverage my expertise in Software Quality Assurance to ensure the delivery of high-quality, reliable products that meet client expectations and industry standards. I aim to contribute to a dynamic team through strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and a passion for continuous improvement in software development processes.

experience.description: Delivering online abacus training and enhancing students’ mental calculation skills.

Designed and administered exams, quizzes, and practical assignments to evaluate students understanding and skills. Managed classroom dynamics effectively, ensuring a conducive learning environment for students. Integrated modern educational technologies, such as interactive presentations and online resources, to enhance the learning experience. Collaborated with colleagues to share best practices and improve teaching strategies and methods.

Enhanced students' mathematical skills, including speed, accuracy, and concentration, through regular practice and exercises. Maintained a positive and disciplined classroom environment, ensuring students remained focused and motivated.

projects.name: Evaly Online Shopping
projects.description: Manual testing of the Evaly e-commerce platform, focusing on product browsing, cart flow, and checkout process.

projects.name: Evershop
projects.description: Manual and automation testing of the Evershop eCommerce platform, focusing on product search, cart, and checkout functionality.

projects.name: Picky Online Shopping
projects.description: Performed manual testing on the Picky online shopping platform. Designed and executed test cases, performed functional and regression testing, and reported bugs.

projects.name: Mahfil App
projects.description: Manual testing of Mahfil, an Islamic social media and content-sharing mobile application. Covered functional, UI, and usability testing.

projects.name: API Testing – Booking API
projects.description: Performed API testing on Booking APIs using Postman and Newman. Created test collections, validated responses, and automated test execution.

projects.name: Booking API – Postman Automation
projects.description: API automation using Postman and Newman to validate Booking APIs and automate response assertions.

projects.name: Rokomari Web Automation
projects.description: Automated testing framework for the Rokomari e-commerce website using Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, Maven, and Java. The project follows the Page Object Model (POM) architecture and covers major user flows including Google login, author-based navigation, filtering, product selection, cart operation, shipping process, and logout.
